```{r Library, include=FALSE}
library(prophet)
library(tidyverse)
library(crypto2)
```


```{r}
# Get Data from CoinMarketCap
coin_list_all <- crypto_list(only_active = TRUE)
```


```{r}
# Function to fetch cryptocurrency historical data with a specified date range
crypto_hist <- crypto_history(coin_list = coin_list_all,
                              convert = "USD", # change to USD or other currency if desired
                              limit = 1,
                              sleep = 0,
                              interval = "1h",
                              start_date = "2024-06-26",  # specify the start date
                              end_date = "2024-06-26")    # specify the end date
# View the fetched data
print(crypto_hist)
```
